name: BÅL
description:
Keep your fire alive for as long as you feel like.  🔥 No goals, no stress, just a nice moment.  🧡

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46. The theme was keep it alive.

🎮 Controls
  • Left mouse button: throw in more firewood
  • Right mouse button: use lighter
  • X/Y: toggle camera inversion
  • Space: toggle cursor lock
🎭 Credits
  • Ava Skoog
  • Free font Super Mario 256 by fsuarez913
  • Free foley from zapsplat.com and opengameart.org
